page.title: 18CAPENHURST-HOUSING
page.content: There is a wide variety of housing in the area.Farming is the main industry and there are 16 farmhouses,many very old but with modern buildings attached In 1954 twenty-two Council houses were built in Penfold Close and they are a mixture of semi- detached & terraced. All but 6 are now privately owned.Some 20 years ago British Nuclear Fuels built 13 semi-detached and terraced houses for their workers on Manor Farm Crecent & most of these are now owned privately also.There are 21 private detached houses & 13 detached bungalows in the area all built to individual designs with large areas of land attached.The houses were built between 1887 & 1970 but the bungalows are modern & no older than 40 years.To the east the farm land borders urban housing estates,mainly privately owned New estates are still being added.
